TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagedNameAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: Allows an instrumented class, or member of an instrumented class, to present an alternate name through management instrumentation.

span.span: Allows an instrumented class, or member of an instrumented class, to present an alternate name through management instrumentation.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

param.span: The alternate name for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.

span.span: The alternate name for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that allows the alternate name to be specified for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that allows the alternate name to be specified for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 보안.NET Framework Security 직접 실행 호출자의 경우 완전히 신뢰합니다.Full trust for the immediate caller. 이 멤버는 부분적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 코드에서 사용할 수 없습니다.This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 자세한 내용은 참조 [부분적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 코드에서 라이브러리를 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)합니다.For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: Gets the name of the managed entity.

span.span: Gets the name of the managed entity.

value.span: 관리 되는 엔터티의 이름을 포함 하는 T:System.String 값을 반환 합니다.

span.span: Returns a T:System.String value containing the name of the managed entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 속성 값Property Value 관리 되는 엔터티의 이름을 포함합니다.Contains the name of the managed entity. ## .NET Framework 보안.NET Framework Security 직접 실행 호출자의 경우 완전히 신뢰합니다.Full trust for the immediate caller. 이 멤버는 부분적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 코드에서 사용할 수 없습니다.This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 자세한 내용은 참조 [부분적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 코드에서 라이브러리를 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)합니다.For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
